sentences.en: -- Many achievements have been made in research on territorial control.
sentences.cn: -- 国土整治研究取得多项成果.

sentences.en: -- New progress has been made in territorial control planning.
sentences.cn: -- 国土整治规划工作取得新进展.

sentences.en: Both Chile and Argentina feel very strongly about their territorial claims to Antarctica.
sentences.cn: 智利和阿根廷对于南极的领土主张都持强硬态度。

sentences.en: Ethiopia's large territorial area takes in a population of more than 40 million people.
sentences.cn: 埃塞俄比亚广袤的国土上生活着4,000多万人口。

sentences.en: He referred indirectly to the territorial dispute.
sentences.cn: 他含蓄地提及了领土争端。

sentences.en: Our satellite infrareds show the animals are fiercely territorial.
sentences.cn: 我们的卫星红外图显示,它们的领土性极强.

sentences.en: Territorial disputes were resolved in guatemala's recognition of belize in 1991.
sentences.cn: 领土争端在1991年危地马拉承认伯利兹后得到解决.

sentences.en: The important question is whether he is prepared to go to war to achieve his territorial ambitions.
sentences.cn: 重要的问题是他是否已准备好发动战争以实现他的领土野心.

sentences.en: The President spoke of the need for territorial compromise.
sentences.cn: 总统谈到了在领土问题上达成和解的必要性。

sentences.en: The ship will remain outside Chinese territorial waters.
sentences.cn: 这艘船将继续呆在中国领海之外。

sentences.en: The Sioux had always fought other tribes for territorial rights.
sentences.cn: 苏人总是为领地权与其他部落作战。

sentences.en: The Vatican successfully mediated in a territorial dispute between Argentina and Chile in 1984.
sentences.cn: 梵蒂冈成功地调解了1984年阿根廷与智利之间的领土争端。

sentences.en: They were not allowed to fish in our territorial waters.
sentences.cn: 不允许他们在我国领海捕鱼.

sentences.en: Two cats or more in one house will also exhibit territorial behaviour.
sentences.cn: 一家若有两只或更多的猫，也会表现出争夺地盘的行为。

sentences.en: We must respect each other's territorial integrity.
sentences.cn: 我们应当尊重彼此的领土完整.

words.tran_cn: 一种活泼的小狗；地籍册；国防自卫队
领土性质或状态；领土权
领土，领域；范围；地域；版图
按地区分配；使成为领土
领土的；区域的；土地的；地方的

phrases.tran_cn: 属地原则；区域管辖；属地管辖权

trans.tran_cn: 领土的，区域的，土地的，地方的
trans.tran_en: related to land that is owned or controlled by a particular country
